EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday in Chicago!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop. We look forward to seeing you next Thursday, September 24 in Chicago.
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Thursday, September 24, 2015 8:00am - 3:00pm (breakfast & lunch will be provided) Workshop Agenda > <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/chicago>
The Westin Chicago North Shore 601 N. Milwaukee Avenue Wheeling, IL 60090 Maps & Directions > <https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Westin+Chicago+North+Shore/@42.150963,-87.911746,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xbdd9c9bd0895a54e?sa=X&ved=0CHcQ_BIwDGoVChMIoOP9v8v-xwIVQqWICh3jZA38>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands On Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS? Please email Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or call (408) 425-9302 <tel:408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
P.S. - Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in joining you, please forward this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/chicago>
